english.segment1: Ive been here before. Now, here I am again. Standing at the door. Praying Youll let me back in
english.segment2: To label me. A prodigal would be. Only scratching the surface. Of who Ive been known to be
english.segment3: Turn me around, pick me up. Undo what Ive become. Bring me back to the place. Of forgiveness and grace. I need You, I need Your help. I cant do this myself. Youre the only one. Who can undo what Ive become
english.segment4: I focused on the score. But I could never win. Trying to ignore. A life of hiding my sin
english.segment5: To label me. A hypocrite would be. Only scratching the surface. Of who Ive been known to be
english.segment6: Turn me around, pick me up. Undo what Ive become. Bring me back to the place. Of forgiveness and grace. I need You, I need Your help. I cant do this myself. Youre the only one. Who can undo what Ive become
english.segment7: Make every step lead me back to. The sovereign way that You
english.segment8: Turn me around, pick me up. Undo what Ive become. Bring me back to the place. Of forgiveness and grace. I need You, I need Your help. I cant do this myself. Youre the only one who can undo. You are the only one who can undo. Youre the only one who can undo. What Ive become
